Trade/Device Name(s): Piccolo Lipid Panel - Capillary Reagent Disc
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Piccolo Triglycerides - Capillary Test System for quantitative measurement of triglycerides in capillary whole blood using the Piccolo xpress Chemistry Analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of triglycerides in capillary (fingerstick) heparinized whole blood for diagnosis and treatment of diseases involving lipid metabolism and various endocrine disorders, used in clinical laboratory or point-of-care settings.
